comment._content: Correct spelling is Vøringsfoss or Vøringsfossen (= the Vøring waterfall).

comment._content: Thanks!  We'll fix the spelling  in the source data and reload description.

comment.author: 34585631@N05
comment._content:
live 20 minutes from here and I do tours as guide into this beautiful waterfall every summer. Eidfjord guide service is there for you if you want to get to know the most spectacular and majestetic waterfall in Norway 182 meeters high!, the history is dramatic in many ways.  This will bring you in special state of mind when you meet mother nature with pure water, fresh air and flowers in blossom. It only takes 30 minutes to walk one way. Join me and never forget this trip! Welcome everyone!
The waterfall is still as beautiful today as before!

Eidfjord Guide Service
Gunn MArit Lægreid
Øvrehagen 26 
5783 Eidfjord,Norway
